patterns_discovered: Dynamic className generation based on view state
Support for dark and light mode themes
gotchas_discovered: Ensuring accessibility by adding focus-visible styles
Maintaining existing styling complexity while adding focus styles

approach_outcome.description: Added focus-visible styles to view toggle buttons

recommendations: Consider extracting common button styling into a reusable utility class
Implement a global focus-ring class for consistent accessibility
Add unit tests to verify focus and state transitions
